mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member_tb ( member_id, member_email, member_pw, member_auth, member_phone, member_name , member_appenddate, member_updatedate) VALUES( #{memberId}, #{memberEmail}, #{memberPw}, #{memberAuth},#{memberPhone}, #{memberName} , #{appendDate}, #{updateDate})
mapper.select: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY a.reservation_creation_date) AS row_num, a.reservation_no, a.reservation_date, a.reservation_creation_date, a.start_time, a.end_time, a.room_no, a.roption_no, b.room_title, c.roption_title from reservation_tb a left join room_tb b on a.room_no = b.room_no LEFT JOIN roomoption_tb c ON a.roption_no = c.roption_no WHERE member_no = #{memberNo};
